feature_model.name: Dynamic Software Product Lines for Service-Based Systems
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Building(_r) :o Energy Management(_r_1) :o Eletricity(_r_1_2) :o Water(_r_1_5) :o Heating(_r_1_6) :m Lighting(_r_7) :m Control(_r_7_8) :o Brightness Detector(_r_7_10) :m Presence Detector(_r_7_11) :m Agenda(_r_12) :m Security(_r_13) :m Camera(_r_13_14) :m OpenClosed Detector(_r_13_15) :m Alarm(_r_16) :m Phonebook(_r_16_17) :m Internet Adress(_r_16_18) :m Comunication(_r_19) :m Internet(_r_19_20) :m GSM(_r_19_21) :m RTC(_r_19_22)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:_r_7_8 or _r_12 constraint_6:_r_16_17 or _r_19_22 constraint_7:_r_16_18 or _r_19_20 constraint_5:_r_16_17 or _r_19_21 constraint_2:_r_13_14 or _r_16 constraint_3:_r_13_15 or _r_16
